title: Cardstar
author: Cardstar
content: Welcome to https://cardstar.top to purchase the accounts and services you want. We also provide blockchain payment construction services and webshell services.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: This, OP, should be in the service section, not here. The services you provide, having multiple competitors, should be cheap. I've not seen such prices like on your website, too expensive. I don't intend using them, but have flocked around such websites and I thought the fun of selling social media services is keeping it very cheap. Why Spam the forum? I found this same post on project development board.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Cardstar on September 03, 2023, 01:39:50 AMWelcome to https://cardstar.top to purchase the accounts and services you want. We also provide blockchain payment construction services and webshell services.@Accardo is right; these services you are posting should not be in the Bitcoin discussion. So I'm just curious, dude, if that's okay with you. Why are you selling YouTube and Twitter accounts? This means that these social media accounts of yours that I mentioned have huge numbers of subscribers and followers, right?Aren't the ones you're selling from hacked accounts, dude? Because there are other big accounts on YouTube and Twitter that we hear about being hacked, the exploiters will sell the acquired account and change the name. I hope the accounts you are selling are not like that. I didn't mean anything by what I said; I am just stating the facts.

comments.author: Cardstar
comments.body: Dude, I don’t sell youtube accounts, that’s youtube’s services, such as helping you like, subscribe, etc., and the number behind it is the number of people. In addition, my account is not a black account stolen by hackers. I registered through a formal channel. Thank you for your feedback.

comments.author: Cardstar
comments.body: Thank you brother for your feedback, because the price in the mall is the retail price, I have changed it to the wholesale price now
